Package controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for the Main Menu screen. This class is responsible for providing the functionality to the Main Menu and all labels and buttons users interact with.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the Main Menu and its features i.e. the clock, time zone, welcome message and displays all appointments.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • displayClock

      public void displayClock()
      displayClock method uses the EventHandler interface with a lambda expression to efficiently display an animated digital clock on the Customers Menu.

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method deletes a selected appointment from the database and updates the apptsTable.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the Delete Appointment button is clicked.

    • viewCurrMonthAppts

      public void viewCurrMonthAppts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the View Current Month's Appointments Radio button is selected. This method runs through the list of all appointments and adds any appointments that start in the current month to a new Obs.List. If there are no appointments starting this month, a dialog box displays letting the user know.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the user selects the currMonthRadioBtn.

    • viewAllAppointments

      public void viewAllAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method displays all appointments from the database into the apptsTable.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the allApptsRadioBtn is selected.

    • viewCurrWeekAppts

      public void viewCurrWeekAppts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method displays the current week's appointments in the database to the apptsTable.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the currWeeksRadioBtn is selected.

    • searchAppts

      public void searchAppts(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This method searches the appointment table for any appointments that have either an Appointment ID or Title that match the text input.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When data is entered into the search bar on the main menu.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is a MySQL database access error.

    • exitApplication

      public void exitApplication(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method closes the application if the user clicks on the Exit button and chooses the OK button option.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - When the Exit button is selected.
